engine.entity

Class SpawnFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.entity.SpawnFactory

  • public class SpawnFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that contains all the code necessary to spawn specific entities with specific behavioural components.
    Author:
    Marco

        Spawn a particle that is a regular n-gon
        Parameters:
        pos - The position in the world
        vel - The velocity
        angularvel - The rotation rate
        scale - The scale
        color - The colour
        lifetime - The lifetime of the particle
        n - The number of points in the particle

        Parameters:

        generalDir - The general direction of the gunpowder
        magnitude - The magnitude of the explosion
        color - The main colour of the explosion
